room_title: Escape room "C'thulhu Awakens" by Sly Fox Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: Everything about these guys is amazing! Awesome staff and seriously amazing rooms! We were the first two beat Cthulhu and have been begging for it to open for months and let me be the first to say, it was well worth the wait!

room_title: Escape room "C'thulhu Awakens" by Sly Fox Escapes in Colorado Springs
review: We did 'Cthulhu Awakens' with three adults. We were very impressed with our first escape room experience! The puzzles were varied and played to different strengths, the room and prop design were excellent, and the story well told! We will certainly be back!
